revised_title: Wavelength and Temperature Dependence of Fluorescence Efficiency in Hexafluoroacetone Vapour
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on hexafluoroacetone vapour to study the wavelength- and temperature-dependence of fluorescence efficiency and primary photochemical yield. They found that the fluorescence efficiency and primary photochemical yield are influenced by the wavelength and temperature of the vapour. The results are plotted in figures and tables for better understanding.
